techmeme.title: Report: Russia arrested notorious cybercriminal Mikhail Matveev for developing malware and running hacking groups; US DOJ filed charges against him in 2023 (Sergiu Gatlan/BleepingComputer)
Samsung Galaxy S24 FE review: reasonable price, telephoto camera, and a big screen, but the screen isn't that sharp and other ~$500 phones offer more value (Allison Johnson/The Verge)
Bluesky replies now default to appear by "hotness", which weights more recent liked replies more heavily; some say this rewards clout farming like X (Shannon Connellan/Mashable)
Sources: ByteDance execs fear that launching its own AI models, or apps powered by the models, in the US could give lawmakers another excuse to attack TikTok (The Information)
Sources: European regulators rebuked Wise in 2022 after finding it lacked proof of address for hundreds of thousands of customers, forcing it into remediation (Akila Quinio/Financial Times)
